Segment.name: IS2
Segment.comment: To transmit scheduled events such as arrivals, departures, and interchange times

Field.name: EventCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the event about which a report is made

Field.name: AccomplishCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of a specified stop

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time1
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: TimeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: BlockIdentification
Field.comment: Identifier for a block of cars

Field.name: Date3
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time2
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: Date4
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time3
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
